review: I rarely write reviews but am giving Amazon's Fire TV 5 stars. As with everything "Amazon", it not only met, but exceeded my expectations. It works like a charm, was very easy to set up, and I truly appreciate being able to talk to a real person when I have a question. Another great job well done Amazon!
author: P G Pauly

review: Received as a gift, too complicated to use, no instructions came with the device, not even a simple guide.  You are supposed to read the internet and install at the same time which is annoying and time-consuming for something that does not have much worth viewing.  The offerings and games may be fine if you have children and want them to spend all their time playing  on these services, but I don't see much offered that would interest a mature adult.  You don't really get any quality movies or programs, only bad movies that appeal to teenagers with lots of violence or games with same said violence.  You can use your WII or Playstation to play games.  I have a Kindle tablet that I use all the time and enjoy, but think this is just a waste of money.
author: chloe46774

What gives?I have logged out and back into Netflix to no avail.  I have also re-installed the app and that has not worked either.Any advice or assistance would be appreciated...
